ibis.ipl
Interface Manageable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Ibis, ReceivePort, Registry, SendPort
public interface Manageable

A Manageable class is able to read and set implementation-dependant management properties.

Method Summary
 String getManagementProperty(String key)
          Returns the value of the specified management property.
 Map<String,String> managementProperties()
          Returns the management properties.
 void printManagementProperties(PrintStream stream)
          Prints the management properties to the specified output stream
 void setManagementProperties(Map<String,String> properties)
          Sets the specified management properties.
 void setManagementProperty(String key, String value)
          Sets a specified management property to a specified value.

setManagementProperties

void setManagementProperties(Map<String,String> properties)
                             throws NoSuchPropertyException
Sets the specified management properties.

Parameters:
properties - the management properties to set.
Throws:
NoSuchPropertyException - is thrown if one or more of the specified property keys are not recognized.

getManagementProperty

String getManagementProperty(String key)
                             throws NoSuchPropertyException
Returns the value of the specified management property.

Parameters:
key - the key for the requested property.
Returns:
the value associated with the property, or null.
Throws:
NoSuchPropertyException - is thrown if the specified property key is not recognized.

setManagementProperty

                           String value)
                           throws NoSuchPropertyException
Sets a specified management property to a specified value.

Parameters:
key - the key for the property.
value - the value associated with the property.
Throws:
NoSuchPropertyException - is thrown if the specified property key is not recognized.
